trans-unit.source: Provides a base implementation of a toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação de base de um item de caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: ToolboxItem is a base class for toolbox items that can be displayed in the toolbox of a design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: ToolboxItem é uma classe base para itens de caixa de ferramentas que pode ser apresentado na caixa de ferramentas de um ambiente de tempo de criação.

trans-unit.source: A toolbox item typically represents a component to create when invoked on a design mode document.
trans-unit.target: Um item de caixa de ferramentas normalmente representa um componente para criar quando foi invocado num documento de modo de estrutura.

trans-unit.source: The ToolboxItem class provides the methods and properties needed to provide the toolbox with the display properties for the toolbox item, to create a component or components when used, and to serialize and deserialize itself for persistence within the toolbox database.
trans-unit.target: A classe do ToolboxItem fornece os métodos e propriedades necessárias para fornecer a caixa de ferramentas com as propriedades de visualização para o item de caixa de ferramentas, para criar um componente ou componentes quando utilizado e para serializar e anular a serialização do próprio para a persistência na base de dados de caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the ToolboxItem class can be configured with a name, bitmap, and type to create, without creating a class that derives from ToolboxItem.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância da classe ToolboxItem pode ser configurada com um nome, o mapa de bits e o tipo para criar, sem criar uma classe que deriva de ToolboxItem.

trans-unit.source: The ToolboxItem class also provides a base class for custom toolbox item implementations.
trans-unit.target: A classe do ToolboxItem também fornece uma classe base para a caixa de ferramentas personalizada implementações do item.

trans-unit.source: A custom ToolboxItem can create multiple components.
trans-unit.target: Um ToolboxItem personalizado pode criar vários componentes.

trans-unit.source: To implement a custom toolbox item, you must derive from ToolboxItem and override the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Serialize%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Deserialize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para implementar um item de caixa de ferramentas personalizadas, tem de derivar de ToolboxItem e substituir a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Serialize%2A>, e <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Deserialize%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Deserialize%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Serialize%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following properties and methods must be configured for a ToolboxItem to function correctly: - The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A> property specifies the label for the toolbox item when displayed in a toolbox.
trans-unit.target: As seguintes propriedades e métodos tem de ser configurados para um ToolboxItem funcionar corretamente: - <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A>propriedade especifica a etiqueta para o item quando apresentado numa caixa de ferramentas.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.TypeName%2A> property specifies the fully qualified name of the type of the component that the item creates.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.TypeName%2A>propriedade especifica o nome completamente qualificado do tipo de componente que cria o item.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.TypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a derived class creates multiple components, the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.TypeName%2A> property may or may not be used, contingent on whether a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A> method override depends on the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Se uma classe derivada cria vários componentes, o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.TypeName%2A>propriedade poderá ou não pode ser utilizada, contingente se um <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>a substituição de método depende do valor desta propriedade.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.TypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.AssemblyName%2A> property specifies the assembly that contains the type of a component that the item creates.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.AssemblyName%2A>propriedade especifica a assemblagem que contém o tipo de um componente que cria o item.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.AssemblyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Bitmap%2A> property optionally specifies a bitmap image to display next to the display name for the toolbox item in the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Bitmap%2A>propriedade especifica opcionalmente uma imagem de mapa de bits para apresentar junto ao nome de apresentação para o item na caixa de ferramentas.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Bitmap%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Filter%2A> property optionally contains any <xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute> objects that determine whether the toolbox item can be used on a particular component.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Filter%2A>propriedade opcionalmente contiver qualquer <xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute>objetos que determinam se o item pode ser utilizado num componente em particular.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Filter%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A> method returns the component instance or instances to insert where this tool is used.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>método devolve a instância de componente ou instâncias ao inserir em que esta ferramenta é utilizada.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Serialize%2A> method saves the toolbox item to a specified <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Serialize%2A>método poupa o item a uma <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> especificado</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Serialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Deserialize%2A> method configures the toolbox item from the state information contained in the specified <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Deserialize%2A>método configura o item das informações de estado contidas no <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> especificado</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Deserialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Initialize%2A> method configures the toolbox item to create the specified type of component, if the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A> method has not been overridden to behave differently.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Initialize%2A>método configura o item para criar o tipo especificado do componente, se o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>método não foi substituído para comportar-se de forma diferente.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Locked%2A> property indicates whether the properties of the toolbox item can be changed.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Locked%2A>propriedade indica se as propriedades do item de caixa de ferramentas podem ser alteradas.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Locked%2A>

trans-unit.source: A toolbox item is typically locked after it is added to a toolbox.
trans-unit.target: Um item de caixa de ferramentas, normalmente, é bloqueado depois de ser adicionada a uma caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Lock%2A> method locks a toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Lock%2A>método bloqueia um item de caixa de ferramentas.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Lock%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CheckUnlocked%2A> method throws an exception if the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Locked%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CheckUnlocked%2A>método emite uma exceção se a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Locked%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Locked%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CheckUnlocked%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> class that creates the specified type of component.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> classe que cria o tipo de componente especificado.

trans-unit.source: The type of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> that the toolbox item creates.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> que cria o item.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> was locked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> foi bloqueado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the assembly that contains the type or types that the toolbox item creates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome da assemblagem que contém o tipo ou tipos que cria o item.

trans-unit.source: The AssemblyName property specifies the assembly that contains the types of the components to create.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AssemblyName Especifica a assemblagem que contém os tipos de componentes para criar.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> that indicates the assembly containing the type or types to create.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>indica que a assemblagem que contém o tipo ou tipos de criar.</xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a bitmap to represent the toolbox item in the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um mapa de bits para representar o item na caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> that represents the toolbox item in the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> que representa o item na caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception if the toolbox item is currently locked.
trans-unit.target: Se o item está atualmente bloqueado, emite uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: The CheckUnlocked method throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Locked%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O método CheckUnlocked emite um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>se o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Locked%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>está definido como `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Locked%2A> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> is locked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> está bloqueado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the company name for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome da empresa para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the company for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>Especifica que a empresa para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after components are created.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre imediatamente depois de componentes são criados.

trans-unit.source: The ComponentsCreated event is raised each time components of this toolbox item are created.
trans-unit.target: O evento ComponentsCreated é desencadeado sempre que são criados componentes deste item de caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when components are about to be created.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando os componentes estão prestes a ser criado.

trans-unit.source: The ComponentsCreating event is raised each time components of the toolbox item are about to be created.
trans-unit.target: O evento ComponentsCreating é desencadeado sempre que os componentes do item estão prestes a ser criado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the component type for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de componente para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the component type for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que especifica o tipo de componente para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Creates the components that the toolbox item is configured to create.
trans-unit.target: Cria os componentes que o item está configurado para criar.

trans-unit.source: The CreateComponents method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A> method to retrieve an array of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> containing the components to create.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método CreateComponents o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>método para obter uma matriz do tipo <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>que contém os componentes a criar.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of created <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Criar uma matriz de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Creates the components that the toolbox item is configured to create, using the specified designer host.
trans-unit.target: Cria os componentes que o item está configurado para criar, utilizar o anfitrião de estruturador especificado.

trans-unit.source: The CreateComponents method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A> method to retrieve an array of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> containing the components to create.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método CreateComponents o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>método para obter uma matriz do tipo <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>que contém os componentes a criar.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> to use when creating the components.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> a utilizar quando criar os componentes.

trans-unit.source: An array of created <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Criar uma matriz de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Creates the components that the toolbox item is configured to create, using the specified designer host and default values.
trans-unit.target: Cria os componentes que o item está configurado para criar, utilizando os valores do anfitrião e a predefinição de estruturador especificados.

trans-unit.source: The CreateComponents method calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A> method to retrieve an array of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> containing the components to create.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método CreateComponents o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>método para obter uma matriz do tipo <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>que contém os componentes a criar.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> to use when creating the components.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> a utilizar quando criar os componentes.

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of property name/value pairs of default values with which to initialize the component.
trans-unit.target: Um dicionário de pares nome/valor de propriedade de valores predefinidos que ao inicializar o componente.

trans-unit.source: An array of created <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Criar uma matriz de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Creates a component or an array of components when the toolbox item is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Cria um componente ou uma matriz dos componentes quando o item é invocado.

trans-unit.source: If `host` is not `null`, the CreateComponentsCore method adds the new components to the designer.
trans-unit.target: Se `host` não é `null`, o método CreateComponentsCore adiciona novos componentes para o estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> to host the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> para alojar o item.

trans-unit.source: An array of created <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Criar uma matriz de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Creates an array of components when the toolbox item is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma matriz dos componentes quando o item é invocado.

trans-unit.source: If `host` is not `null`, the CreateComponentsCore method adds the new components to the designer.
trans-unit.target: Se `host` não é `null`, o método CreateComponentsCore adiciona novos componentes para o estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The designer host to use when creating components.
trans-unit.target: O estruturador anfitrião a utilizar quando criar os componentes.

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of property name/value pairs of default values with which to initialize the component.
trans-unit.target: Um dicionário de pares nome/valor de propriedade de valores predefinidos que ao inicializar o componente.

trans-unit.source: An array of created <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Criar uma matriz de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> for the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>para o item.</xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>

trans-unit.source: The assembly name describes the assembly information needed to load the toolbox item's type.
trans-unit.target: O nome de assemblagem descreve as informações de assemblagem necessárias para carregar o tipo de item de caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>objetos.</xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the description for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a descrição para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the description for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que especifica a descrição para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the toolbox item from the specified serialization information object.
trans-unit.target: Carrega o estado do item de caixa de ferramentas do objeto de informações de serialização especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to load from.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> para carregar a partir do.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that indicates the stream characteristics.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que indica as características de fluxo.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display name for the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome a apresentar para o item.

trans-unit.source: This DisplayName property indicates the string that is displayed for the toolbox item in the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade DisplayName indica a cadeia que é apresentada para o item na caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: By default, the base <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> class sets its DisplayName property to a short form of the fully qualified type name specified by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.TypeName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, a base de <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>classe define a respetiva propriedade DisplayName para uma ditada abreviada do nome de tipo totalmente qualificado especificado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.TypeName%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.TypeName%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: The display name for the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: O nome a apresentar para o item.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se dois <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> instâncias são iguais.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> a comparar com a atual <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> é igual a atual <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the filter that determines whether the toolbox item can be used on a destination component.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o filtro que determina se o item pode ser utilizado num componente de destino.

trans-unit.source: The Filter property collection contains <xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute> objects that specify the policy that the design-time environment uses to determine whether a toolbox item can be used on the destination component.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de propriedade de filtro contém <xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute>objetos que especificar a política que utiliza o ambiente de tempo de design para determinar se um item de caixa de ferramentas pode ser utilizado no componente de destino.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information on restricting the scope in which a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> can be used, see the documentation for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre restringir o âmbito no qual a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>podem ser utilizadas, consulte a documentação para a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute>classe.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute"> </xref> objetos.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Filters a property value before returning it.
trans-unit.target: Filtros de um valor de propriedade antes de o devolver.

trans-unit.source: The FilterPropertyValue method enables a property to always clone values, or to provide a default value when none exists.
trans-unit.target: O método FilterPropertyValue permite uma propriedade para clonar sempre valores ou para fornecer um valor predefinido quando não existe nenhum.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to filter.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade para filtrar.

trans-unit.source: The value against which to filter the property.
trans-unit.target: O valor contra para filtrar a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A filtered property value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de propriedade filtrado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o código hash para esta instância.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash para o atual <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Enables access to the type associated with the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: Permite o acesso para o tipo associado o item.

trans-unit.source: The designer host is used to access an implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService> interface.
trans-unit.target: O anfitrião estruturador é utilizado para aceder a uma implementação do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService>

trans-unit.source: However, the loaded type is not added to the list of references in the designer host.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o tipo carregado não é adicionado à lista de referências no anfitrião estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The designer host to query for <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O anfitrião de estruturador para consultar <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeResolutionService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type associated with the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: O tipo associado o item.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified type, optionally using a specified designer host and assembly name.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância do tipo especificado, utilizando opcionalmente um nome de anfitrião e a assemblagem estruturador especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the current document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> para o documento atual.

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> that indicates the assembly that contains the type to load.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>indica que a assemblagem que contém o tipo de carga.</xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode ser <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The name of the type to create an instance of.
trans-unit.target: O nome do tipo para criar uma instância do.

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether or not to add a reference to the assembly that contains the specified type to the designer host's set of references.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se deve ou não adicione uma referência para a assemblagem que contém o tipo especificado para o anfitrião estruturador do conjunto de referências.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the specified type, if it can be located.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do tipo especificado, se puder ser localizado.

trans-unit.source: typeName is not specified.
trans-unit.target: typeNameNão foi especificado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the current toolbox item with the specified type to create.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o item atual com o tipo especificado para criar.

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method configures the toolbox item to create the specified type, if the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A> method has not been overridden to behave differently.
trans-unit.target: O método de inicialização configura o item para criar o tipo especificado, se o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>método não foi substituído para comportar-se de forma diferente.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method performs the following operations: - Sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.AssemblyName%2A> property to an <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> indicating the assembly of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Este método efetua as seguintes operações:-define o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.AssemblyName%2A>propriedade para um <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>que indica que a assemblagem do tipo especificado.</xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.AssemblyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A> property to a short type name based on the name of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: -Define o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A>propriedade para um nome de tipo curtos, baseado no nome do tipo especificado.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Adds any <xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute> attributes found on the specified type to the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Filter%2A> property collection.
trans-unit.target: -Adiciona qualquer <xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute>atributos encontrado o tipo especificado para o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Filter%2A>coleção de propriedades.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.Filter%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItemFilterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> that the toolbox item creates.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>que cria o item.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> was locked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> foi bloqueado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the toolbox item is transient.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o item é transitório.

trans-unit.source: The IsTransient property defaults to `false`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade IsTransient, será assumida a `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if this toolbox item should not be stored in any toolbox database when an application that is providing a toolbox closes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se este item de caixa de ferramentas não deve ser armazenado na base de dados de caixa de ferramentas quando fecha uma aplicação que está a fornecer uma caixa de ferramentas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Locks the toolbox item and prevents changes to its properties.
trans-unit.target: Bloqueia o item de caixa de ferramentas e impede que as alterações para as respetivas propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The properties of a toolbox item cannot be changed when it is locked.
trans-unit.target: Não não possível alterar as propriedades de um item de caixa de ferramentas, quando este está bloqueado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> is currently locked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref> está atualmente bloqueada.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> is locked, you cannot adjust its properties.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>está bloqueado, não é possível ajustar as respetivas propriedades.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the toolbox item is locked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o item está bloqueado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreated"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentsCreated method raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: O método OnComponentsCreated gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreated>eventos.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreated>

trans-unit.source: This method is called after a toolbox item is invoked to create components and the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A> method has returned.
trans-unit.target: Este método for chamado depois de um item de caixa de ferramentas é invocado para criar os componentes e a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>método devolveu.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentsCreated method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnComponentsCreated também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventArgs"></xref> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatedEventArgs"> </xref> que fornece dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreating"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreating"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentsCreating method raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreating> event.
trans-unit.target: O método OnComponentsCreating gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreating>eventos.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreating>

trans-unit.source: This method is called after a toolbox item is invoked to create components, just before the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Este método for chamado depois de um item de caixa de ferramentas é invocado para criar componentes, imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentsCreating method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnComponentsCreating também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs"></xref> that provides data for the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs"> </xref> que fornece dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the original bitmap that will be used in the toolbox for this item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o mapa de bits original que será utilizado na caixa de ferramentas para este item.

trans-unit.source: This bitmap should be 16x16 pixels and should be used in the Visual Studio toolbox, not on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Este mapa de bits deve ser 16x16 pixels e deve ser utilizado na caixa de ferramentas da Visual Studio, não na superfície de desenho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> that represents the toolbox item in the toolbox.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"> </xref> que representa o item na caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of properties.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um dicionário de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The Properties property dictionary becomes read-only after the toolbox item has been locked.
trans-unit.target: O dicionário de propriedades de propriedades torna-se só de leitura depois do item foi bloqueado.

trans-unit.source: Values in the properties dictionary are validated through the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ValidatePropertyValue%2A> method, and default values are obtained from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetDefaultProperty%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Valores no dicionário de propriedades são validados através do <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ValidatePropertyValue%2A>método e valores predefinidos são obtidos a partir do <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetDefaultProperty%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetDefaultProperty%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ValidatePropertyValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of name/value pairs (the names are property names and the values are property values).
trans-unit.target: Um dicionário de pares nome/valor (os nomes são os nomes de propriedade e os valores são valores de propriedade).

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the toolbox item to the specified serialization information object.
trans-unit.target: Guarda o estado do item de caixa de ferramentas para o objeto de informações de serialização especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to save to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> para guardar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that indicates the stream characteristics.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que indica as características de fluxo.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição deste membro, consulte o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*>método.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser utilizado apenas quando o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>instância é convertida para um <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>interface.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> para preencher com dados.

trans-unit.source: The destination (see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>) for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino (consulte <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>) para esta serialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> that represents the current <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.String>que representa o atual <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the current <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que representa o atual <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the fully qualified name of the type of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> that the toolbox item creates when invoked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome completamente qualificado do tipo de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> que cria o item quando invocado.

trans-unit.source: The TypeName property specifies the fully qualified type name of the type of component to create.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade TypeName Especifica o nome de tipo totalmente qualificado do tipo de componente de criar.

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified type name of the type of component that this toolbox item creates.
trans-unit.target: O nome de tipo totalmente qualificado do tipo de componente que cria este item de caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: Validates that an object is of a given type.
trans-unit.target: Valida um objeto de um determinado tipo.

trans-unit.source: The ValidatePropertyType method is called as a helper method to the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ValidatePropertyValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método ValidatePropertyType denomina-se como um método de programa auxiliar para o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ValidatePropertyValue%2A>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ValidatePropertyValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to validate.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade para validar.

trans-unit.source: Optional value against which to validate.
trans-unit.target: Valor opcional relativamente ao qual a validar.

trans-unit.source: The expected type of the property.
trans-unit.target: O tipo esperado da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>to allow <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: value is , and allowNull is .
trans-unit.target: valueis , and allowNull is .

trans-unit.source: value is not the type specified by expectedType.
trans-unit.target: valueNão é do tipo especificado pelo expectedType.

trans-unit.source: Validates a property before it is assigned to the property dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Valida uma propriedade antes de lhe está atribuído ao dicionário de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The ValidatePropertyValue method is called whenever a value is set in the property dictionary.
trans-unit.target: O método ValidatePropertyValue denomina-se sempre que um valor é definido no dicionário de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: With this method, you can change the value of an object before committing it, or reject it by throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: Com este método, pode alterar o valor de um objeto antes de consolidar esta ou rejeitá-lo ao gerar uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to validate.
trans-unit.target: O nome da propriedade para validar.

trans-unit.source: The value against which to validate.
trans-unit.target: O valor em relação às quais a validar.

trans-unit.source: The value used to perform validation.
trans-unit.target: O valor utilizado para efetuar a validação.

trans-unit.source: value is , and propertyName is "IsTransient".
trans-unit.target: valueé , e propertyName é "IsTransient".

trans-unit.source: Gets the version for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a versão para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the version for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que especifica a versão para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>
